docs.lead_paragraph: Six of the largest U.S. school districts are switching to antibiotic-free chicken, officials said on Tuesday, pressuring the world's top meat companies to adjust production practices in the latest push against drugs used on farms.

headline.main: Big U.S. School Districts Plan Switch to Antibiotic-Free Chicken
headline.print_headline: Big U.S. School Districts Plan Switch to Antibiotic-Free Chicken

docs.snippet: Six of the largest U.S. school districts are switching to antibiotic-free chicken, officials said on Tuesday, pressuring the world's top meat companies to adjust production practices in the latest push against drugs used on farms.

docs.lead_paragraph: NBC Universal on Tuesday launched Radius, a digital fitness network that will allow people to work out with trainers on their smartphones or tablets.

headline.main: NBC Universal Launches Fitness Digital Network

docs.lead_paragraph: Congress prepared on Monday to scale back Michelle Obama’s school-lunch nutrition mandates and curtail some clean water regulations in a $1 trillion spending bill that would avert a government shutdown.

headline.main: G.O.P. Extracts Price for Averting Shutdown
headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Extracts Price for Averting Shutdown

docs.abstract: Congress prepares to scale back Michelle Obama’s school-lunch nutrition mandates and curtail some clean water regulations in a $1 trillion spending bill that would avert a government shutdown, but extract policy price from Democratics.
docs.snippet: Congress prepared on Monday to scale back Michelle Obama’s school-lunch nutrition mandates and curtail some clean water regulations in a $1 trillion spending bill that would avert a government shutdown.

byline.contributor: Julia Preston contributed reporting from New York.
byline.original: By JONATHAN WEISMAN and ASHLEY PARKER

docs.lead_paragraph: The Affordable Care Act prescribed some broad requirements for coverage, but a lot of discretion was left to the states, as comparisons reveal.

docs.lead_paragraph: Key lawmakers weighed legislation to permit a reduction of benefits for up to 1 million retirees at economically distressed multiemployer pension plans, officials said late Monday as Congress labored over a $1.1 trillion measure to keep the government operating past midnight Thursday.

docs.lead_paragraph: The necropsy on the endangered orca found dead off Vancouver Island showed it was pregnant with a full-term fetus, and that someone removed several teeth from the dead killer whale before it could be examined.

headline.main: Dead Orca Was Pregnant With Full-Term Fetus
headline.print_headline: Dead Orca Was Pregnant With Full-Term Fetus

docs.snippet: The necropsy on the endangered orca found dead off Vancouver Island showed it was pregnant with a full-term fetus, and that someone removed several teeth from the dead killer whale before it could be examined.

headline.main: Sam Kass, White House Chef and Nutrition Adviser, Steps Down

docs.abstract: Sam Kass, a personal chef to the Obama family who rose to become one of the first lady’s top policy advisers, will step down at the end of the month, the Obama administration said on Monday.
docs.snippet: Sam Kass, a personal chef to the Obama family who rose to become one of the first lady’s top policy advisers, will step down at the end of the month, the Obama administration said on Monday.

docs.lead_paragraph: The first family's longtime personal chef is leaving the White House.
